message.body: Besides title, cast, crew, production staff, special thanks and fringe recommendations, did you have other ideas for what's on the program?
scott and i talked about a blurb about the show too but ill leave that to him
Aha, if you have that in an email to forward to me that'd be great - otherwise I'll search Scott's email
Was the blurb that Scott imagined about the creative process or the plot itself?
i think both but not sure he ever put pen to paper. we just thought it would be a good idea for those not used to devised work.
